sn56.1:4.4: A mendicant who has samādhi truly understands.
sn56.1:4.6: They truly understand: ‘This is suffering’ … ‘This is the origin of suffering’ … ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ … ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
sn56.1:4.8: A mendicant who has samādhi truly understands.
sn56.1:5.1: That’s why you should practice meditation to understand: ‘This is suffering’ … ‘This is the origin of suffering’ … ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ … ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.”
